front.title: Bandwidth Provisioning and Restoration Mechanisms in Optical Networks

abstract.t: With the advent of tunable lasers and optical switches, dynamic configuration of optical networks has become possible. ThisInternet-Draft presents a signaling mechanism for bandwidthprovisioning and restoration based on this dynamic configuration ofoptical networks. The mechanism adopted uses a 1:N restorationscheme, preparing the backup lightpath in advance before failuresoccur.
